title: MunchkinÂ® Baby Bottle & Small Parts Cleaning Set, Includes High Capacity Dishwasher Basket & Bristle Bottle Brush, Blue
features: Set includes high capacity dishwasher basket and standing bristle bottle brush with suction cup base
Extra-large baby dishwasher basket accommodates both standard and wide Mouth bottles - Includes straw rack plus special area for holding and cleaning pacifiers
Easily squeeze and slide nipples into place - No need to open top lid to load and unload. Large lower basket holds collars, valves, spouts and other small bottles and sippy cup accessories
Bottle brush has strong, but soft nylon bristles and flexible neck with easy-grip handle for a thorough, slip-free clean - Includes bonus rubber nipple in brush handle for cleaning small accessories
Replace brush every 30-45 days. Use in top rack of dishwasher only
description: All the small things matter. Designed for wide mouthed bottles and nipples, the High Capacity Dishwasher Basket fits all your little one's baby items and bottle parts into one dishwasher safe place. You don't have to waste your nights tediously cleaning every little thing. This dishwasher caddy features a patented straw cleaning rack, a nipple sanitizing lid, and a basket for pacifiers, spoons, bottle sealing discs, valves, caps, and other small parts. And the Bristle Bottle Brush has strong, but soft nylon bristles for a scratch-free clean and a flexible neck for hard-to-reach edges. It sticks upright on your sink using a suction cup base for fast drying, off of counters. There's also a convenient soft rubber nipple brush in the bottom of the handle, making this brush equally well-suited for cleaning pump parts, valves and other small bottle accessories. The perfect set for an easy, thorough clean!
